00018 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00019 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00020 
00021 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00022 
00029 L4_CV l4_timeout_s l4util_micros2l4to(unsigned int mus) L4_NOTHROW;
00030 
00032 L4_CV void l4_sleep(int ms) L4_NOTHROW;
00033 
00034 /* Suspend thread for a period of <us> micro seconds.
00035  * WARNING: This function is mostly bogus since the timer resolution of
00036  *          current L4 implementations is about 1ms! */
00037 L4_CV void l4_usleep(int us) L4_NOTHROW;
00038 
00044 L4_INLINE void l4_sleep_forever(void) L4_NOTHROW __attribute__((noreturn));
00045 
00046 L4_INLINE void
00047 l4_sleep_forever(void) L4_NOTHROW
00048 {
00049   for (;;)
00050     l4_ipc_sleep(L4_IPC_NEVER);
00051 }
00052 
00054 static inline void
00055 l4_touch_ro(const void*addr, unsigned size) L4_NOTHROW
00056 {
00057   const char *bptr, *eptr;
00058 
00059   bptr = (const char*)(((l4_addr_t)addr) & L4_PAGEMASK);
00060   eptr = (const char*)(((l4_addr_t)addr+size-1) & L4_PAGEMASK);
00061   for(;bptr<=eptr;bptr+=L4_PAGESIZE){
00062     asm volatile("or  %0,%%rax \n"
00063                  :
00064                  : "m" (*(const unsigned*)bptr)
00065                  : "rax" );
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00071 static inline void
00072 l4_touch_rw(const void*addr, unsigned size) L4_NOTHROW
00073 {
00074   const char *bptr, *eptr;
00075 
00076   bptr = (const char*)(((l4_addr_t)addr) & L4_PAGEMASK);
00077   eptr = (const char*)(((l4_addr_t)addr+size-1) & L4_PAGEMASK);
00078   for(;bptr<=eptr;bptr+=L4_PAGESIZE){
00079     asm volatile("or  $0,%0 \n"
00080                  :
00081                  : "m" (*(const unsigned*)bptr)
00082                  );
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 EXTERN_C_END
00087 
00088 #endif
